Our next session will be on installing and using Jupyter. This session will cover what Jupyter Notebooks are, how to install and run Jupyter, and how to use it. Join us at 6:00 in the Estin Room (room 302) of Mugar Library.

If you’re interested in coding in Python, R, Ruby, or any of the other 40 languages supported by Jupyter - you’ll want to attend this event. And beginners are welcome!
